ygData.subject: Re: I have a question about eqgame.exe
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you for your assistance in this matter.  I just wanted to let you all know I got it working again.  I have xp and Directx 9 but i got the dx9 after i got
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you for your assistance in this matter. I just wanted to let
you all know I got it working again. I have xp and Directx 9 but i
got the dx9 after i got installed the game too. So I completely and
totally deleted every inch of eq. That wasnt easy. But after I
reinstalled it it went right in and worked fine. I have been playing
for the last few hours now lol. Anyway thanks again.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "lady_of_onlinegames"
<lady_1980_93446@y...> wrote:
> I get to the servers and then it starts to go but then a box comes
up
> and says eqgame.exe encountered a problem and needs to close.
> Anyone else having this problem and do you know what to do about
it?
> can someone assist me please?
>
> Thanks
